meanings.definition: Dubonnets (noun): a type of fortified wine
meanings.sent1: At the party, they served delicious dubonnets to the guests.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a glass of dubonnets with her dinner.
meanings.sent3: The chef used dubonnets to add a special touch to the sauce.
meanings.sent4: The cellar was filled with bottles of dubonnets, aging gracefully.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of dubonnets filled the room, enticing everyone to try a sip.

meanings.definition: Dubonnets (verb): to mix or serve with Dubonnet wine
meanings.sent1: She likes to dubonnets her cocktails with a splash of Dubonnet wine.
meanings.sent2: The bartender will dubonnets the drink with a twist of lemon.
meanings.sent3: He decided to dubonnets the punch with a hint of mint for a refreshing taste.
meanings.sent4: The chef will dubonnets the sauce with a touch of Dubonnet wine for a rich flavor.
meanings.sent5: They always dubonnets their special cocktails with the finest Dubonnet wine.
